llm_response.Key Information Summary: Material name is 'Heraklit-Platte' (layer 2, 0.01m thick) in a floor (IfcSlab) element; another layer is 'Dämmung - weich' (soft insulation, 0.14m). 'Heraklit-Platte' is a wood wool board, typically used as a mineral-bonded panel.
